xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1041396-Banded Together: The Boys from Glen Rock High 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null In the small town of Glen Rock, New Jersey, 25-miles and a world away from New York City, a group of friends from high school form a band to live out their adolescent dreams. From their unassuming high school auditorium to the main stage of the Tonight Show with Conan O’Brien, the musicians – Jimmy, Lee, John, Jerry, Frank, Jeff, Floyd, and Doug –are playing today at the highest levels of the music industry. BANDED TOGETHER is a remarkable story of a true band of brothers, a group of close friends from high school who bonded through music.--Montclairfilm Banded Together: The Boys from Glen Rock High
